trends: There have been no other sightings in Sandy Hook
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out on my porch for a cigarette I sat down on my chair and was looking out at my neighborhood because my porch faces the neighborhood I looked up at the trees for minute and saw a object that was blue with a green hint around it vanish within two or three seconds it was cloudy out so it was not a shooting star and it was not a plane because it just vanished into thin air and it was not in the clouds it was really fast I looked down and my neighbor was also outside looking up at the sky just standing there I was thinking like what the **** was that and I just sat there and finished my cigarette and stared up at the sky for about ten minutes and then went inside it was my second time seeing a object like that and the first time was about a month ago and I didn't think I should report it but then when I saw it again the other night I was like I have to report it I will write again if I see it I would have taken a picture but it was so fast
